column4: hello everybody.....am trying to register my nick & am on http://freenode.net/faq.shtml#nicksetup looking at instructions for this & it tells me...../msg nickserv register <your-password> <your-email>......... where do I enter this info ?? in a terminal or here ??
or even better.. in the channel window where the server stuff appears
that way it wont get sent to the entire channel if you forget the /
